original_text: And we utterly destroyed them, as we did unto Sihon king of Heshbon, utterly destroying the men, women, and children, of every city.
korean_text: 우리가 헤스본 왕 시혼에게 행한 것과 같이 그 성읍들을 멸망시키되 각 성읍의 남녀와 유아를 멸망시켰으나

sentences.original_text: as we did unto Sihon king of Heshbon
utterly destroying the men, women, and children
